name: A. Amr and Music
statement:
Amr is a young coder who likes music a lot. He always wanted to learn
how to play music but he was busy coding so he got an idea.Amr has
instruments, it takes days to learn -th instrument. Being busy, Amr
dedicated days to learn how to play the maximum possible number of
instruments.Amr asked for your help to distribute his free days between
instruments so that he can achieve his goal.
